Comments_List: It gives us some good ideas.
Many researchers in related fields of biostat were invited to give a talk. Many topics were covered in this course.
it broadens my horizon in terms of the research method and research topic
Many interesting topics.  Help me broaden horizons.
The course is very helpful in in obtaining biostatistics-related knowledge from researchers from other institutions.
This seminar has guest lecturers that shared their research expertise every week.
Great seminar. Would appreciate more speakers that discuss topics that are accessible to first year students. Overall, really enjoyed it.
The workshops we're enlightening. The topics were very interesting. Somehow for me, I wish there could have been more guests from industry, sharing there experience in the real world.
The instructor gives us the opportunity to learn various advancement in statistics and biology.
Thank you Dr. Kane for organizing the wonderful seminars.
Great job organizing and selecting speakers!
Yes. Because it is helpful to build background knowledge.
It is a good way to get familiar with biostatistics research.
A good course for people who want to learn about others' research.
I will recommend. There are many interesting topics.
I would recommend the course because the workload is little but students will gain much.
This class provides the opportunity to learn the latest breakthroughs in biostatistics.
This is a weekly seminar on a variety of topics related to Biostatistics. Would highly recommend.
I recommend this course. You could get a grasp of some cutting-edge techniques and project.
